name: Morning Light
description: Mid-morning illumination with clear bright light and energetic atmosphere

prompt.base: Morning light, mid-morning illumination, bright clear atmosphere, energetic daylight, fresh lighting, crisp shadows, active mood, daytime clarity, vibrant morning
prompt.positive: morning light, bright daylight, clear illumination, energetic atmosphere, fresh lighting, crisp shadows, active mood, vibrant colors, daytime clarity, clean light, sharp details, morning energy
prompt.negative: dim lighting, evening mood, sunset colors, night darkness, artificial light, dusk atmosphere

technical.atmospheric_effects: Clear air, high visibility, crisp atmosphere

variations.name: Sunny Morning
variations.modifier: bright sunshine, clear sky, strong light, cheerful atmosphere, optimistic mood

variations.name: Overcast Morning
variations.modifier: cloudy sky, diffused light, soft shadows, muted colors, gentle illumination

variations.name: Indoor Morning
variations.modifier: window light, interior spaces, domestic morning, home atmosphere, cozy daylight

examples: A busy street in morning light, bright clear atmosphere, energetic mood, crisp shadows
A breakfast scene with morning sunlight streaming through windows, fresh and vibrant atmosphere
